statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT sales_date, sales_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, sales_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount <= 5000
SELECT sales_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales_amount FROM SalesData GROUP BY sales_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE demand_index > 0.8;
SELECT sale_date, amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT market_name, market_location, demand_index FROM market_data WHERE demand_index > 0.5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT market_name, AVG(demand_index) AS avg_demand_index FROM market_data GROUP BY market_name HAVING avg_demand_index > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_demand_index DESC;

SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity, amount FROM sales_data JOIN market_data ON sales_data.product_id = market_data.market_id WHERE amount > 100 AND demand_index > 0.6 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data ORDER BY market_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;

SELECT sales_data.sale_id, market_data.market_name FROM sales_data INNER JOIN sales_market_join ON sales_data.sale_id = sales_market_join.sale_id INNER JOIN market_data ON sales_market_join.market_id = market_data.market_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_size = 'Large' ORDER BY market_name ASC;
SELECT s.sale_id, m.market_name, s.sale_amount FROM sales_data s JOIN sales_market_join smj ON s.sale_id = smj.sale_id JOIN market_data m ON m.market_id = smj.market_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_amount, forecast_date FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_amount > 1000;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount ASC, sales_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY market_name ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_amount FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_amount < 500 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT combined_id, sales_id, market_id, sales_amount, market_name FROM combined_data WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500 AND market_name = 'Europe' ORDER BY combined_id ASC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sales_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_info WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT market_name, region FROM market_data WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT sales_amount, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM product_info ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_info WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT market_name, region FROM market_data WHERE market_size > 5000 ORDER BY market_size DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM product_info WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT sales_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sales_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
